alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 10:24PM CDT until July 13 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Fayette County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1024 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hawkeye, or 10 miles southwest of West Union, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fayette and Maynard around 1035 PM CDT. Arlington and Stanley around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Highway 93 And County W 14, Donnan, Highway 93 And County V 68, Randalia, Richfield, Highways 3 And 187 and County Road W 45 And 187. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
